$ gocdk
TODO more about gocdk

Usage:
  gocdk [command]

Available Commands:
  apply       TODO Apply Terraform for BIOME
  biome       TODO Manage biomes
  build       TODO Build a Docker image
  demo        TODO Manage demos
  deploy      TODO Deploy the biome
  help        Help about any command
  init        TODO: Initialize a new project
  launch      TODO Launch BIOME
  provision   TODO Provision resources
  serve       TODO Run an auto-reloading local server

Flags:
  -h, --help   help for gocdk

Use "gocdk [command] --help" for more information about a command.

$ gocdk help

$ gocdk --help

$ gocdk -h

Usage:
